properties.entry: I already know about that.
I can't delete messages here. No one gave me permission. :'(
The number of header columns does not match the number of data columns.
I do not know anything about this: %s
Ooooops... I found an error. Please don't beat me! --> "%s"
Tell me the name of the group and the name(s) of the resource(s) to add.
I already have a resource group with this name: %s
You have to name it. ;-)
This resource group is empty. Please add some resources to it, using this syntax: `group add %s [resource] "[resource with spaces in name]" ...`
Tell me the name of the group and the name of the resource to remove.
Tell me the name of the existing group you want to rename and then the new name.
Unknown sub-command [list (default), create, add, remove, rename, delete]
I do not know this resource group: %s
No such command `%s`.
Sorry, nothing to see here. :-(
I can process only PNG images. One or more images submitted are in a different format.
Only for text channels
This command works only in the %s channel.
There is nothing here! Why don't you consider updating your resources?
I know neither a user nor a resource with that name.
I don't know this resource. =(
I do not know this user. =(
